mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_feed SET iuser = #{iuser}, contents = #{contents}, location = #{location}
mapper.select: SELECT A.ifeed, A.contents, A.location, A.created_at AS createdAt, iuser AS writerIuser, B.nm AS writerNm, B.pic AS writerPic FROM t_feed A JOIN t_user B USING (iuser) ORDER BY ifeed DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{feedCnt}
